author: Maggie Davis
title: Awww! Shah Rukh Khan & AbRam’s late night stroll is the most adorable thing you will see on this Valentine’s Day
text: > Showbiz Awww! Shah Rukh Khan & AbRam’s late night stroll is the most adorable thing you will see on this Valentine’s Day When the rest of the world are making plans to celebrate Valentine’s Day, Shah Rukh Khan and AbRam went for a light night stroll at Juhu beach in Mumbai. (See Picture Inside) By Maggie Davis | Published:  47 AM IST
